00028 ChunkBase::ChunkBase ( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps )
00029 {
00030     const size_t idx[] = {nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps};
00031     init( idx );
00032     addNeededFromString( neededProperties );
00033     LOG_IF( NDimensional<4>::getVolume() == 0, Debug, warning )
00034             << "Size " << nrOfTimesteps << "|" << nrOfSlices << "|" << nrOfRows << "|" << nrOfColumns << " is invalid";
00035 }

00041 Chunk::Chunk( const ValuePtrReference &src, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps ):
00042     _internal::ChunkBase( nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps ),
00043     ValuePtrReference( src )
00044 {
00045     assert( ( *this )->getLength() == getVolume() );

00047 
00048 Chunk Chunk::cloneToNew( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps )const
00049 {
00050     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> newSize = getSizeAsVector();
00051 
00052     if ( nrOfColumns )newSize[0] = nrOfColumns;
00053 
00054     if ( nrOfRows )newSize[1] = nrOfRows;
00055 
00056     if ( nrOfSlices )newSize[2] = nrOfSlices;
00057 
00058     if ( nrOfTimesteps )newSize[3] = nrOfTimesteps;
00059 
00060     const ValuePtrReference cloned( get()->cloneToNew( newSize.product() ) );
00061     return Chunk( cloned, newSize[0], newSize[1], newSize[2], newSize[3] );
00062 }

00064 bool Chunk::convertToType( short unsigned int ID )
00065 {
00066     if( getTypeID() != ID ) {
00067         return convertToType( ID, getScalingTo( ID ) );
00068     }
00069 
00070     return true;
00071 }
00072 
00073 bool Chunk::convertToType( short unsigned int ID, const scaling_pair &scaling )
00074 {
00075     static const util::Value<uint8_t> one( 1 );
00076     static const util::Value<uint8_t> zero( 0 );
00077 
00078     if( getTypeID() != ID || !( scaling.first->eq( one ) && scaling.second->eq( zero ) ) ) { // if its not the same type - replace the internal ValuePtr by a new returned from ValuePtrBase::copyToNewById
00079         ValuePtrReference newPtr = getValuePtrBase().copyToNewByID( ID, scaling ); // create a new ValuePtr of type id and store it in a ValuePtrReference
00080 
00081         if( newPtr.isEmpty() ) // if the reference is empty the conversion failed
00082             return false;
00083 
00084         static_cast<ValuePtrReference &>( *this ) = newPtr; // otherwise replace my own ValuePtr with the new one
00085     }
00086 
00087     return true;
00088 }

00103 void Chunk::copyLine( size_t secondDimS, size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, Chunk &dst, size_t secondDimD, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const
00104 {
00105     const size_t idx1[] = {0, secondDimS, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00106     const size_t idx2[] = {getSizeAsVector()[0] - 1, secondDimS, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00107     const size_t idx3[] = {0, secondDimD, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00108     copyRange( idx1, idx2, dst, idx3 );
00109 }

00111 void Chunk::copySlice( size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, Chunk &dst, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const
00112 {
00113     const size_t idx1[] = {0, 0, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00114     const size_t idx2[] = {getSizeAsVector()[0] - 1, getSizeAsVector()[1] - 1, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00115     const size_t idx3[] = {0, 0, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00116     copyRange( idx1, idx2, dst, idx3 );

00119 void Chunk::copyRange( const size_t source_start[], const size_t source_end[], Chunk &dst, const size_t destination[] ) const
00120 {
00121     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_start ), Debug, error )
00122             << "Copy start " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_start )
00123             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the source chunk";
00124     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_end ), Debug, error )
00125             << "Copy end " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_end )
00126             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the source chunk";
00127     LOG_IF( ! dst.isInRange( destination ), Debug, error )
00128             << "Index " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( destination )
00129             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the destination chunk";
00130     const size_t sstart = getLinearIndex( source_start );
00131     const size_t send = getLinearIndex( source_end );
00132     const size_t dstart = dst.getLinearIndex( destination );
00133     get()->copyRange( sstart, send, *dst, dstart );
00134 }

00136 size_t Chunk::compareRange( size_t flat_start, size_t flat_end, const Chunk &dst, size_t destination ) const
00137 {
00138     return get()->compare( flat_start, flat_end, *dst, destination );
00139 }
00140 size_t Chunk::compareRange( const size_t source_start[], const size_t source_end[], const Chunk &dst, const size_t destination[] ) const
00141 {
00142     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_start ), Debug, error )
00143             << "memcmp start " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_start )
00144             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the first chunk";
00145     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_end ), Debug, error )
00146             << "memcmp end " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_end )
00147             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the first chunk";
00148     LOG_IF( ! dst.isInRange( destination ), Debug, error )
00149             << "Index " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( destination )
00150             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the second chunk";
00151     LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00152             << "Comparing range from " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_start ) << " to " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_end )
00153             << " and " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( destination );
00154     const size_t sstart = getLinearIndex( source_start );
00155     const size_t send = getLinearIndex( source_end );
00156     const size_t dstart = dst.getLinearIndex( destination );
00157     return compareRange( sstart, send, dst, dstart );
00158 }
00159 size_t Chunk::compareLine( size_t secondDimS, size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, const Chunk &dst, size_t secondDimD, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const
00160 {
00161     const size_t idx1[] = {0, secondDimS, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00162     const size_t idx2[] = {0, secondDimD, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00163     const size_t idx3[] = {getSizeAsVector()[0] - 1, secondDimD, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00164     return compareRange( idx1, idx2, dst, idx3 );
00165 }
00166 size_t Chunk::compareSlice( size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, const Chunk &dst, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const
00167 {
00168     const size_t idx1[] = {0, 0, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00169     const size_t idx2[] = {0, 0, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00170     const size_t idx3[] = {getSizeAsVector()[0] - 1, getSizeAsVector()[1] - 1, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00171     return compareRange( idx1, idx2, dst, idx3 );
00172 }

00192 Chunk &Chunk::operator=( const Chunk &ref )
00193 {
00194     _internal::ChunkBase::operator=( static_cast<const _internal::ChunkBase &>( ref ) ); //copy the metadate of ref
00195     ValuePtrReference::operator=( static_cast<const ValuePtrReference &>( ref ) ); // copy the reference of ref's data
00196     return *this;
00197 }

00199 std::list<Chunk> Chunk::autoSplice ( uint32_t acquisitionNumberStride )const
00200 {
00201     if ( !isValid() ) {
00202         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Cannot splice invalid Chunk (missing properties are " << this->getMissing() << ")";
00203         return std::list<Chunk>();
00204     }
00205 
00206     util::fvector4 offset;
00207     const util::fvector4 voxelSize = propertyValue( "voxelSize" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00208     util::fvector4 voxelGap;
00209 
00210     if( hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) )
00211         voxelGap = propertyValue( "voxelGap" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00212 
00213     const util::fvector4 distance = voxelSize + voxelGap;
00214     size_t atDim = getRelevantDims() - 1;
00215 
00216     switch( atDim ) { // init offset with the given direction
00217     case rowDim :
00218         offset = this->propertyValue( "rowVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00219         break;
00220     case columnDim:
00221         offset = this->propertyValue( "columnVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00222         break;
00223     case sliceDim:
00224 
00225         if( this->hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00226             offset = this->propertyValue( "sliceVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00227         } else {
00228             const util::fvector4 row = this->propertyValue( "rowVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00229             const util::fvector4 column = this->propertyValue( "columnVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00230             assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( row.sqlen(), 1 ) );
00231             assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( column.sqlen(), 1 ) );
00232             offset[0] = row[1] * column[2] - row[2] * column[1];
00233             offset[1] = row[2] * column[0] - row[0] * column[2];
00234             offset[2] = row[0] * column[1] - row[1] * column[0];
00235         }
00236 
00237         break;
00238     case timeDim :
00239         offset = util::fvector4( 0, 0, 0, 1 );
00240     }
00241 
00242     // prepare some attributes
00243     assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( offset.sqlen(), 1 ) ); // it should be norm here
00244     const util::fvector4 indexOriginOffset = offset * distance[atDim];
00245     size_t cnt = 0;
00246     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Splicing chunk at dimenstion " << atDim + 1 << " with indexOrigin stride " << indexOriginOffset << " and acquisitionNumberStride " << acquisitionNumberStride;
00247     std::list<Chunk> ret = splice( ( dimensions )atDim ); // do low level splice - get the chunklist
00248     BOOST_FOREACH( Chunk & ref, ret ) { // adapt some metadata in them
00249         util::fvector4 &orig = ref.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00250         uint32_t &acq = ref.propertyValue( "acquisitionNumber" )->castTo<uint32_t>();
00251         orig = orig + indexOriginOffset * ( float )cnt;
00252         acq += acquisitionNumberStride * cnt; //@todo this might cause trouble if we try to insert this chunks into an image
00253         cnt++;
00254     }
00255     return ret;
00256 }
00257 
00258 std::list<Chunk> Chunk::splice ( dimensions atDim )const
00259 {
00260     std::list<Chunk> ret;
00261     //@todo should be locking
00262     typedef std::vector<ValuePtrReference> ValuePtrList;
00263     const util::FixedVector<size_t, dims> wholesize = getSizeAsVector();
00264     util::FixedVector<size_t, dims> spliceSize;
00265     spliceSize.fill( 1 ); //init size of one chunk-splice to 1x1x1x1
00266     //copy the relevant dimensional sizes from wholesize (in case of sliceDim we copy only the first two elements of wholesize - making slices)
00267     spliceSize.copyFrom( &wholesize[0], &wholesize[atDim] );
00268     //get the spliced ValuePtr's (the volume of the requested dims is the split-size - in case of sliceDim it is rows*columns)
00269     const ValuePtrList pointers = this->getValuePtrBase().splice( spliceSize.product() );
00270     //create new Chunks from this ValuePtr's
00271     BOOST_FOREACH( ValuePtrList::const_reference ref, pointers ) {
00272         ret.push_back( Chunk( ref, spliceSize[0], spliceSize[1], spliceSize[2], spliceSize[3] ) ); //@todo make sure this is only one copy-operation
00273         static_cast<util::PropertyMap &>( ret.back() ) = static_cast<const util::PropertyMap &>( *this ); //copy my metadate into all spliced
00274     }
00275     return ret;
00276 }

00278 size_t Chunk::useCount() const
00279 {
00280     return getValuePtrBase().useCount();
00281 }
00282 
00283 void Chunk::swapAlong( const dimensions dim ) const
00284 {
00285     const size_t elSize = bytesPerVoxel();
00286     const util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> whole_size = getSizeAsVector();
00287     const util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> outer_size = whole_size;
00288 
00289     uint8_t *swap_start = boost::shared_static_cast<uint8_t>( get()->getRawAddress().lock() ).get();
00290     const uint8_t *const swap_end = swap_start + whole_size.product() * elSize;
00291 
00292     size_t block_volume = whole_size.product();
00293 
00294     for( int i = data::timeDim; i >= dim; i-- ) {
00295         assert( ( block_volume % whole_size[i] ) == 0 );
00296         block_volume /= whole_size[i];
00297     }
00298 
00299     assert( block_volume );
00300     block_volume *= elSize;
00301     const size_t swap_volume = block_volume * whole_size[dim];
00302     const std::auto_ptr<uint8_t> buff( static_cast<uint8_t *>( malloc( block_volume ) ) );
00303 
00304     //iterate over all swap-volumes
00305     for( ; swap_start < swap_end; swap_start += swap_volume ) { //outer loop
00306         // swap each block with the one at the oppsite end of the swap_volume
00307         uint8_t *a = swap_start; //first block
00308         uint8_t *b = swap_start + swap_volume - block_volume; //last block within the swap-volume
00309 
00310         for( ; a < b; a += block_volume, b -= block_volume ) { // grow a, shrink b (inner loop)
00311             memcpy( buff.get(), a, block_volume );
00312             memcpy( a, b, block_volume );
00313             memcpy( b, buff.get(), block_volume );
00314         }
00315 
00316     }
00317 }
00318 }
